titles.title: Fiscal Year 2025 Veterans Affairs Major Medical Facility Authorization Act
Fiscal Year 2025 Veterans Affairs Major Medical Facility Authorization Act
Fiscal Year 2025 Veterans Affairs Major Medical Facility Authorization Act
Fiscal Year 2025 Veterans Affairs Major Medical Facility Authorization Act
A bill to authorize a major medical facility project for the Department of Veterans Affairs for fiscal year 2026 in St. Louis, Missouri, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Reported by Senator Moran without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 278.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Veterans' Affairs
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
